name: video-thumbnail-generator
title: Video Thumbnail Generator
description: Generate thumbnail images from video at specified timestamps
content:
Overview

This application generates thumbnail images from video files at specified timestamps. Built using OpenCV, it creates resized preview images that maintain the original aspect ratio, perfect for video previews and galleries.

Features

  • Extract thumbnails at specific timestamps
  • Customizable thumbnail width (height auto-calculated)
  • Maintains original video aspect ratio
  • High-quality JPEG output with adjustable quality

Parameters

  • Input Video: Upload your video file from stash
  • Timestamps: Comma-separated timestamps in seconds for thumbnails (default: 0 for first frame)
  • Thumbnail Width: Width in pixels (default: 320px, height calculated automatically)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates JPEG thumbnail images for each timestamp, named with the timestamp (e.g., video_thumbnail_5.00s.jpg).

Use Cases

  • Creating video preview images
  • Generating thumbnails for video galleries
  • Creating chapter markers for videos
  • Video content preview generation
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$RANDOM_$$RANDOM"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; [ ! -d "$REPO_DIR" ] && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/video_thumbnail_generator.py" "${videoFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -t "${timestamps}" -w ${width}
